Package index

All functions

build_mixture_indicator()
Build the set of mixture prior indicators
build_mixture_probabilities()
Build the set of mixture combination prior probabilities
calc_norm_factors()
Calculate fixed sample normalization factors for RNA-Seq or Ribo-Seq data
dte
Translational Efficiency Ribo-Seq and RNA-Seq data
get_contrast_posterior()
Get per-draw probability that a given contrast is 0
get_sim()
Extract a single simulated data set from a simulation run of the sampler

Set the value of one of the modifiable elements of `standata`
